properties.Title: Extreme Cold Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Extreme cold wind chill values near minus 55 are expected tonight into Saturday morning. ### Watch for cold related symptoms: shortness of breath, chest pain, muscle pain and weakness, numbness and colour change in fingers and toes. Extreme cold warnings are issued when very cold temperatures or wind chill creates an elevated risk to health such as frost bite and hypothermia. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to NUstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #NUStorm.
Expires: 2020-02-22T12:27:19-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-02-21T20:28:19-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.1437562501.2020
Area: Gjoa Haven, Kugaaruk
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Extreme Cold Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: A period of very cold wind chills continues. The coldest wind chill values will be near minus 55. ### Extreme cold puts everyone at risk. Watch for cold related symptoms: shortness of breath, chest pain, muscle pain and weakness, numbness and colour change in fingers and toes. Extreme cold warnings are issued when very cold temperatures or wind chill creates an elevated risk to health such as frost bite and hypothermia. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to NUstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #NUStorm.
Expires: 2020-02-22T07:10:08-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-02-21T15:10:08-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3738953508.2020
Area: Gjoa Haven
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Special Air Quality Statement In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Elevated pollution levels are expected or occurring. ### For more information on current air quality, visit www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/environment/air-land-water/air. Visit www.airhealth.ca for information on how to reduce your health risk and your personal contribution to pollution levels, as well as for current and forecast AQHI values. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada.
Expires: 2020-02-22T04:56:38-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, the B.C. Ministry of Environment, 2020-02-21T12:56:38-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.4294083931.2020
Area: Stuart - Nechako
properties.Author: Environment Canada, the B.C. Ministry of Environment

properties.Title: Precautionary Drinking Water Advisory For The Hamlet Of Sunset View Beach Located In The R.m. Of Mervin No. 499
properties.Summary:
Description: A Precautionary Drinking Water Advisory has been issued for the Hamlet of Sunset View Beach located in the R.M. of Mervin No. 499. The advisory is for the entire Hamlet of Sunset View Beach and for any individuals who may access the Sunset View Beach water system. The advisory is in effect until March 2nd, 2020.
Expires: 2020-03-06T11:30:00-06:00
Originated from CAP Alert: SK Turtleford and RM of Mervin, 2020-02-21T11:22:05-06:00, E55860F8-8A52-A1C9-A5F4-9492D55EC6B7
Area: R.M. of Mervin No. 499
properties.Author: SK Turtleford and RM of Mervin
